alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:50AM CDT until August 08 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 450 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Newcastle, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norman, Moore, Newcastle, Blanchard, Purcell, Noble, Slaughterville, Lexington, Goldsby, Washington, Cole, Etowah, Lake Thunderbird, and Little Axe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
